text: I'm building a theme and trying to add custom vanilla JS. I'm getting the uncaught error "$ is not defined". Assuming my script is loading before jQuery? But I include it after main.js....I'm just now using the boilerplate theme, so I did not include jQuery on my own, I'm assuming HubSpot includes it somewhere?
`$().jquery` in the web dev tools in the console will tell you if jquery is loaded and respond with the version number
if you don’t see it there, then you aren’t including it. you could also search your entire theme files for jquery or $
